description.en: In 1938, Liu Bing entered the Chinese People's Anti-Japanese Military and Political University in Yan'an to study.

description.en: Studied at the Central Party School of the CPC in 1955.

position.en: First Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee; Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee, Vice Chairman of the Revolutionary Committee

description.zh-cn: 刘冰于1956年至1966年担任清华大学党委第一副书记，1970年起任党委副书记、革命委员会副主任。
description.en: Liu Bing served as the First Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee of Tsinghua University from 1956 to 1966, and from 1970, he served as Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee and Vice Chairman of the Revolutionary Committee.

position.en: First Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee

description.zh-cn: 刘冰担任清华大学党委第一副书记期间，协助时任校长兼党委书记的蒋南翔主持党委日常工作。
description.en: While serving as the First Deputy Secretary of the Party Committee of Tsinghua University, Liu Bing assisted Jiang Nanxiang, who was then the President and Party Secretary, in managing the daily work of the Party Committee.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命爆发后，刘冰被打倒，遭受残酷迫害。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Cultural Revolution, Liu Bing was overthrown and brutally persecuted.

description.zh-cn: 习近平是习仲勋的儿子。
description.en: Xi Jinping is the son of Xi Zhongxun.

description.zh-cn: 在迟群、谢静宜不在时，时任清华大学领导的刘冰批准了习近平的入学申请。
description.en: When Chi Qun and Xie Jingyi were away, Liu Bing, then a leader at Tsinghua University, approved Xi Jinping's admission application.

description.zh-cn: 在刘冰的批准下，习近平于1975年进入清华大学学习。
description.en: With Liu Bing's approval, Xi Jinping began his studies at Tsinghua University in 1975.

description.zh-cn: 刘冰与清华大学党委的惠宪钧、柳一安、吕方正等人先后两次联名写信，推动了此事件的发生。
description.en: Liu Bing, along with Hui Xianjun, Liu Yi'an, and Lü Fangzheng from the Tsinghua University Party Committee, co-signed two letters, initiating the incident.

description.zh-cn: 刘冰等人的联名信旨在揭发清华大学党委书记迟群的严重问题。
description.en: The joint letter from Liu Bing and others was intended to expose the serious problems of Chi Qun, the Party Secretary of Tsinghua University.

description.zh-cn: 刘冰等人的联名信旨在揭发谢静宜的严重问题。
description.en: The joint letter from Liu Bing and others was intended to expose the serious problems of Xie Jingyi.

description.zh-cn: 刘冰上书事件引发了毛泽东在全国发动“批邓、反击右倾翻案风”运动。
description.en: The Liu Bing Letter Incident triggered Mao Zedong to launch the nationwide 'Criticize Deng, Counter the Right-Deviationist Verdict-Reversing Wind' campaign.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东因刘冰上书事件发动了“批邓、反击右倾翻案风”运动。
description.en: Mao Zedong launched the 'Criticize Deng, Counter the Right-Deviationist Verdict-Reversing Wind' campaign in response to the Liu Bing Letter Incident.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在“批邓、反击右倾翻案风”运动中受到批判。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping was criticized during the 'Criticize Deng, Counter the Right-Deviationist Verdict-Reversing Wind' campaign.

description.zh-cn: 作为“刘冰上书事件”的当事人，刘冰在此运动中被指为“诬告信”并受到批判。
description.en: As the main figure in the 'Liu Bing Letter Incident', Liu Bing's letter was labeled a 'false accusation' and he was criticized during this campaign.

description.zh-cn: 1978年，刘冰调任兰州大学党委书记兼校长。
description.en: In 1978, Liu Bing was transferred to Lanzhou University as Party Secretary and President.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛在清华大学担任政治辅导员时，刘冰是其老领导。
description.en: When Hu Jintao was a political instructor at Tsinghua University, Liu Bing was his superior.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛在甘肃省工作期间，经常去兰州大学看望时任校长的刘冰。
description.en: While working in Gansu Province, Hu Jintao often visited Liu Bing, who was then the president of Lanzhou University.

position.zh-cn: 副书记兼秘书长、常务副书记
position.en: Deputy Secretary and Secretary-General, Executive Deputy Secretary

description.en: Nie Dajiang succeeded Liu Bing as President of Lanzhou University.
